Name: Saga Cube
About the game: Immerse yourself in the world of SAGA CUBE by embodying little Heuggy with Koda the fox by your side. go on an adventure full of riddles and puzzles of all kinds. Put your brain to the test and go in search of the Angelic Cube fragments in order to restore harmony between foxes and humans. Let yourself be taken on a wonderful journey in which one thing is certain: it is better to think before you act Main Features Puzzle solving. Solve puzzles that are all different from each other Stunning 3D landscapes. Explore uniquely designed levels in 3D, from stunning ruins to gargoyle dungeons to Ancient Egypt. An engaging story. Follow the story of Heuggy the mouse and Koda the fox through different biomes to conquer cube fragments Fun physics-based gameplay. Jump, push, think you'll never know what to expect]
